translations: 肿块（lump 的复数）；金丝鸟病；块煤
结块；成团；笨重地行走（lump 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: 整笔付款；一次总算，一次总付
混合价格；总括价格；整笔计价格

sentences.sentence: This sauce has lumps in it.
The lumps will need to be surgically removed.
This material gradually coalesced into lumps called planetesimals as gravity and chance smashed smaller pieces together.
sentences.translation: 随着重力和机会将较小的碎片粉碎在一起，这种物质逐渐聚集成块状，被称为天体。
